scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && ./mvnw spring-boot:run"
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently -k "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && mvnw.cmd spring-boot:run"
scripts.build: npm run --cwd frontend build && cd backend && mvnw.cmd package
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run install" "cd backend && mvnw.cmd clean install"
